name: 22/23 Y1C - Team 3 (Wright) - Ghost Gallops
description:
Welcome to the haunted world of Ghost Gallops! In this thrilling game, you'll be racing against a ghostly apparition that has been haunting the tracks for years. With its eerie glow and haunting presence, this ghost will stop at nothing to cross the finish line first.

As the player, you'll need to use all of your skills and racing expertise to outmaneuver and outpace this spooky specter.

Do you have what it takes to beat the Ghost Gallops and become the champion of the haunted tracks? Get ready to put on your running shoes and face the ultimate challenge of racing against the unknown in this spine-tingling adventure!
